interactions.description: 4 AM - Jett crying. Jillian got up twice to soothe him. I laid there for 5 min while baby cried. She said thanks for the help sarcastically.
Came home from gym, found her reading. Apologized for not helping with Jett at 4am. Offered to take tomorrow morning shift. Took Jones to school. Made breakfast for family.
Morning school rush. Light situation - set healthy boundary about always language (good). Coffee spill left ring on wood table - got defensive with logic instead of just owning it and cleaning up.
Took initiative to apologize for getting defensive about the coffee. She explained the table is a sore spot. Apologized for that too. Quick repair, no drama.

Jillian made Joshua a sandwich for lunch. Later she shared a story about her job - Joshua was fully engaged, helped her out, made her laugh. She asked him to put Jett down for a nap and he enthusiastically agreed and did it. She looked very happy.
